doc:
James Monroe Iglehart https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Monroe_Iglehart 0 James Monroe Iglehart (born September 4, 1974) is an American stage actor and singer. Iglehart is perhaps best known for his Tony Award-winning performance as the Genie in the original Broadway production of Aladdin. Iglehart assumed the role of Marquis de Lafayette/Thomas Jefferson in the Broadway company of Hamilton in April 2017. James_Monroe_Iglehart ( born September_4_,_1974 ) is an_American_stage_actor_and_singer .
